00052 static Optimizer *lbann::Optimizer::create_optimizer(int method) {
00053   Optimizer *optimizer = NULL
00054 
00055   if (LearnRateMethod == 1) { // Adagrad
00056     optimizer = new Adagrad((float) 0.1 /*0.01*/, (float) 1e-6, grid);
00057   }else if (LearnRateMethod == 2) { // RMSprop
00058     optimizer = new RMSprop((float) 0.001, (float) 0.9, (float) 1e-6, grid);
00059   }else {
00060     optimizer = new SGD();
00061   }
00062   return optimizer;
00063 }
